body.p: To activate the logging of the last processing stage, involving the usage of the Chemistry processor to generate the PDF from the merged HTML, use the -v (or --verbose) DITA-OT parameter from the command line.When the transformation is started from an Oxygen application, this parameter is automatically set.

section.title: Chemistry Console Logging
section.p: Besides the global verbosity, it is possible to control Oxygen PDF Chemistry console logging separately by creating a custom logback.xml configuration file. This is helpful if you want to hide the INFO messages or write the logs into a separate file.
